title: crashes
body: I'm trying to download league but every time it gets to 41% it crashes any help?

replies.body: it did not work it crashed at 41% again don't know what's happening

There's probably an issue along your route to the server, in which case, we'll need to investigate further. I'd like you to reach out to our tech team by submitting a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) I also encourage you to attach a set of logs to your submission after grabbing some Hextech logs [using our Toolkit.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367)

Let me know if you have any questions.
I'm re installing right now ill tell you at 41% if it crashes
